articles.title: Lewis Hamilton to leave Mercedes and join Ferrari for 2025 Formula 1 season - Sky Sports
articles.description: Lewis Hamilton will leave Mercedes and join Ferrari for the 2025 Formula 1 season.
articles.content:
Lewis Hamilton will leave Mercedes and join Ferrari for the 2025 Formula 1 season.

articles.title: Guenther Steiner shares intriguing theory behind rejected Andretti F1 bid - Planet F1
articles.description: "So you need to make 100 percent sure you can prove you will not fail."
articles.content: Former Haas team boss Guenther Steiner believes Formula 1 rejected Andretti’s bid to become the sport’s 11th team to protect not only the existing teams, but also protect Andretti “from themselves”.… [+4349 chars]
